caption: The two men and the woman are talking while they heard something. One of the men runs out and finds a gunner shooting him from upstairs. Then the remaining man runs out also, leaving the woman there. The two men fight with the gunner, but then the gunner disappears. They then realize something and rush back. The woman has met with the gunner, and they look familiar. When the men return, the woman has been dead. The two men and a policeman then go to a hospital to see something. They find that there’s something on the dead people’s feet.
